message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, now it's your turn.
I'll take a big share, but it's a good start!
I'll give you a better deal this time. Don't be too greedy!
You're getting closer to the right idea, but I still want more!
Getting closer to the middle ground! Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a bit more than last time!
Let's split it 50/50, it's only fair!
